at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.datastore.api

Interface DatastoreDriver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRestDriver, CouchDBDriver, HbaseDriver, RiakDriver

    public interface DatastoreDriver
    Interface which has to be implemented by a datastore driver for use in DatastoreManager

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyLoader

        PropertyLoader getPropertyLoader()
        Get property loader for datastore
        Returns:
        the property loader or null if none exists

          Object object)
        Store a new object in the given datastore

        datastore - given datastore
        object - the object to persist
        Returns:

        String id,

        Store a new object with the given id in the datastore
        Parameters:
        datastore - given datastore
        id - the id to use in the datastore
        object - the object to persist

      • find

        <T> T find(Datastore datastore,
         Class<T> objectClass,
         String id)
        Find an object in the given datastore by the given id.
        Parameters:
        datastore - given datastore
        objectClass - class of the searched object
        id - the id to search for
        Returns:
        the found object

        Delete an object with the given id from the given datastore

        objectClass - class of the object to delete
        id - id of the object to delete
